item.title: Python疑難排解
item.description: pip的錯誤 ValueError: Unable to find resource t64.exe in package pip._vendor.distlib 當您嘗試: python -m pip install --upgrade pip 卻遇到上面的錯誤時，請做以下事情即可解決 python -m pip uninstall
